charaepi_ch0243_80_yuri/2301_1101_0100_2:
Gloria invited [Name:PlayerNickname ] to a
training session in the forest.
charaepi_ch0243_80_yuri/2301_1201_0300_1:
To wrap up the session, I’d like to battle you.
Will you accept my challenge?
charaepi_ch0243_80_yuri/2301_0401_0500_1: I had a feeling you’d say that! Thank you!
charaepi_ch0243_80_yuri/2301_0402_0700_1: OK! I’ll give it my all as well!
charaepi_ch0243_80_yuri/2301_1201_0900_1: Let’s give it everything we’ve got!
charaepi_ch0243_80_yuri/2301_1201_1100_1:
Phew... That was some great training!
Thanks again!
charaepi_ch0243_80_yuri/2301_0402_1500_1: W-was I? That’s a little embarrassing...
charaepi_ch0243_80_yuri/2301_1201_1600_1:
[Name:PlayerNickname ], I wanted to train
with you so I could regain my senses.
charaepi_ch0243_80_yuri/2301_1201_1700_1:
A while ago, Urshifu and I met in the Galar
region, on the Isle of Armor.
charaepi_ch0243_80_yuri/2301_1201_1900_1:
On the Isle of Armor, there’s a place called the
Master Dojo.
charaepi_ch0243_80_yuri/2301_1201_2000_1:
Many Trainers and Pokémon trained there under
the tutelage of Master Mustard!
charaepi_ch0243_80_yuri/2301_1201_2100_1: Master Mustard’s training was very tough...
charaepi_ch0243_80_yuri/2301_1201_2200_1:
But Urshifu and I worked hard, and together we
strengthened our hearts and bodies!
charaepi_ch0243_80_yuri/2301_1201_2300_1:
At the dojo, everyone would go through the same
training together...
charaepi_ch0243_80_yuri/2301_1201_2400_1:
and we also battled each other to build up our
strength, work on our moves, and toughen
our spirit!
charaepi_ch0243_80_yuri/2301_1201_2500_1:
After all that training, we’d drink a bowl of
Max Soup together to warm up! And it was
so tasty!
charaepi_ch0243_80_yuri/2301_1201_3000_1:
Urshifu can’t stand the flavor of the Max
Mushrooms used in Max Soup...
charaepi_ch0243_80_yuri/2301_1201_3100_1: That’s why he can’t have Max Soup as is...
charaepi_ch0243_80_yuri/2301_1201_3200_1:
But there’s a specific ingredient that you can add
to Max Soup to get Urshifu to drink it.
charaepi_ch0243_80_yuri/2301_1201_3800_1:
The correct answer is... Max Honey made by
Dynamax Vespiquen!
charaepi_ch0243_80_yuri/2301_1201_3900_1:
The flavor of Max Soup that Urshifu and I
drank together...
charaepi_ch0243_80_yuri/2301_1201_4000_1: It was better than when I had it alone!
charaepi_ch0243_80_yuri/2301_1201_4100_1: Just talking about it is making me hungry.
charaepi_ch0243_80_yuri/2301_1201_4200_1:
It isn’t Max Soup, but I can make some of my
signature curry. We can eat it together!
charaepi_ch0243_80_yuri/2301_1201_4300_1:
If you train together and eat delicious
food together...
charaepi_ch0243_80_yuri/2301_1201_4400_1: you’ll be glad that you gave it your all!
